content:
One time, I was running late for my garden performance,
so I caught a ride with Esassani,
and guess what? We arrived five minutes early!
info: 闲聊-关于SNPC闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Actually, Mobai is quite the performance artist—
I've never once seen him prepare any props,
yet he can pull out a teacup anywhere, anytime!
info: 闲聊-关于SNPC闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
And then, whenever I try to sell my finished items to Glenn,
he always gets this puzzled look on his face like
"How am I supposed to price this?"
info: 闲聊-关于SNPC闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Marbles made of sponge,
and masks made of balloons -
at Glenn's place, they've become special "Memorabilia" items with unique pricing.
info: 闲聊-关于SNPC闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
I often ask Glenn to buy materials for performance props,
And every time,
Glenn would look at me curiously as I "buy trash",

content:
Mors has an incredible way with words.
Even the most ordinary scientific principles,
when he explains them, somehow make you feel like you're right there in the moment.
